document_data.name: ''Sash of Heat Endurance''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Sashes of heat endurance''''' were [[magical item]]s that could be found in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Description: These items were red [[silk]] [[sash]]es, brocaded with gold thread depicting writhing flames. These sashes could not be worn over armor heavier than [[leather armor|leather]].
document_data.Powers: These sashes protected the wearer from normal fires that were smaller than a lamp flame. The wearer could also easily endure air temperatures of up to {{SI|130|F}} comfortably. Wearers did not suffer from dehydration while wearing the sash.
document_data.Owners: These items were specially crafted by members of the [[Brotherhood of the True Flame]]. Lower-ranking members of the Brotherhood were awarded them as gifts.
